page.title: 16 MANOR PARK
page.content:
{MANOR PARK}is a sports club centered at the bottom of {GREAT {MALVERN}it consists of{Tennis,Go-Shin {Jitsu ,Archery,Bowls and Squash {sections. }The club also takes part in the {Racket Ball }leagues and the {Table Tennis }leagues.
Each year{Manor Park }stages a{ {Junior Tennis Competition},which many people come to compete in from many miles away. There are about {Six {Hundred Members }from all the clubs put together so {Manor Park}is thriving.A recently completed lounge affords a place to relax after a hard time on court.
Planned for the future is an indoor{Bowling Rink}to be built next to the {Squash Courts.
